name: Cave Jumper (ThatRumme)
description:
In this game you are an adventurer jumping into caves to explore them and find treasure.

The game is a 3d platformer, where you have to use your movement to get through the 3 levels without falling into the lava.

Made for Ludum Dare 48 game jam.

Controls / How To Play

WASD: Move

SPACE: Jump

MOUSE1: Superjump (launches you in the direction you are aiming)

Get to the chest in the end of the cave to beat the level.
